structure.unit: ALCOHOLIC BEVERAGES -- PROHIBITIONS, RESTRICTIONS, AND REGULATIONS

law.catch_line: Minor may stock, arrange displays, and sell malt beverages.
law.text: Persons at least eighteen (18) years of age may stock, arrange displays, accept payment for, and sack malt beverages by the package, under the supervision of a person twenty (20) years of age or older.
law.history: Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 522, sec. 19, effective July 15, 1998. -- Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 389, sec. 1.
